summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBeekman 1802 Bloom Cream Daily Moisturizer goes beyond the glow to make your skin bloom! Show your skin some kindness by feeding your skin a shot of goat milk prebiotic and milk postbiotic to restore healthy, youthful radiance and see your skin in full bloom.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly delivers moisture beyond the surface for petal-soft skinRestores skinâ€™s healthy hydration for a more youthful appearanceHelps control oily skin and keeps skin balancedBoosts appearance of skin health and fights dullness for blooming radianceResearch Results100% said skin was softer*97% saw healthier looking skin*97% said skin looked radiant**Based on a 4-week, 33 subject consumer questionnaire while used as directedKey IngredientsBeekman 1802's proprietary blend of goat milk prebiotic and milk postbiotic--like yogurt for your skin--deeply nourishes, bringing balance to all skin types for healthy, dewy, radiant skin.The Good Salt: formulated with healing Epsom salts to soften and soothe dry skinItem 2569244How To UseDirections: Apply morning and night daily.Step 1: Start with freshly cleansed skin.Step 2: Bloom your cream by holding the jar between both hands and using your thumbs to apply even pressure on either side of the flat circular surface.Step 3: Scoop up the product with your fingers and press and massage the cream into skin in circular motions until all of the product has been absorbed.Routine: Cleanse skin with Milk Wash makeup-removing cleanser, then layer on Milk Drops and seal in moisture with Bloom Cream. To mix it up, use the surface of the pump as your beauty palette to mix in any Beekman 1802 product.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate, Propanediol, Magnesium Sulfate, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Colostrum, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Lactose, Milk Protein, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Honey, Eryngium Alpinum (Blue Thistle) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Niacinamide, Whey Protein, Gluconolactone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Oleate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Zinc Stearate, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Tocopherol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Lecithin...and kindness.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Directions: Apply morning and night daily.Step 1: Start with freshly cleansed skin.Step 2: Bloom your cream by holding the jar between both hands and using your thumbs to apply even pressure on either side of the flat circular surface.Step 3: Scoop up the product with your fingers and press and massage the cream into skin in circular motions until all of the product has been absorbed.Routine: Cleanse skin with Milk Wash makeup-removing cleanser, then layer on Milk Drops and seal in moisture with Bloom Cream. To mix it up, use the surface of the pump as your beauty palette to mix in any Beekman 1802 product.

reviews.headline: I got a pump not a tube...
reviews.comments: okay so first of all I received a bottle with a pump that felt cheap. I was like okaaaaay so I tried to use it and the product has like separated or something because there is this clear liquid and chunks of white stuff that comes out. I'm very disappointed with this particular purchase.

reviews.headline: ew
reviews.comments: feels too rubbery and then too watery on your skin, the texture is literally a nightmare. i don't know how people can use this i'm glad i only bought the mini

reviews.headline: Awesome Product!
reviews.comments: I am 73 years old and this is, by far, the best moisturizer I have ever used. I highly recommend this product. It's suitable for all skin types and makes your skin feel like silk. Try it, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.headline: A staple in my moisturizing routine
reviews.comments: This is a great moisturizer. Keeps skin soft and never feels greasy or heavy.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Saved my Skin
reviews.comments: I have SUPER SENSITIVE SKIN AND HAVE TRIED SO MANY PRODUCTS. Everyones skin is going to be different what may not work for some may work for others. I combine this with another product and apply it morning and night and my Acne has Definitely gona Away and my skin Irritation i get from just the change in weather has yet to show up since i started using this product. I love everything beakman and have no regrest.

reviews.headline: Skip the purchase
reviews.comments:
Wanted to love this product but it didnt work for my skin. Left me often very dry and breaking out more than I have since my teenage days. 

Its very water and in the summer it doesnt work well with makeup.

reviews.headline: Not sure what it is, but..
reviews.comments: My skin hates this moisturizer. I have very sturdy skin and have never had such a bad reaction to products as i do with beekman. The bloom cream made my face red and sting, like a sunburn! Ive tested out different application methods and they all cause horrible burning. Im not sure what ingredienr causes this reaction..

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Love this cream, I use it for my night time cream and I add the Dream Booster serum. My skin looks and feels great!

reviews.headline: Didnt work
reviews.comments: I bought the bloom cream to use during the day and the beekman rx for night. Didnt care for the bloom day cream, it pilled so much & im only using beekman skincare. I tried it a few times and it just didnt work on my skin. The Rx Milk Moisturizer was so much better

reviews.headline: Not my preference
reviews.comments: This profuct is watery and only made my skin more dry

reviews.headline: Watery consistency
reviews.comments: This is a thin/lightweight formula to begin with, but it also comes out of the pump separated and extra watery. No matter hiw mich I shake the bottle to mix it, mostly water comes out when I pimp it. Really disappointed given the price and decent reviews!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is everything!! The creamy lotion penitrates the face leaving it soft and radiant. I get quite a few comments "your face is glowing".

reviews.headline: My holy grail moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I think im on my fourth bottle of this moisturizer and I'm planning to buy another soon. I love the way it sits on my skin and keeps it hydrated for the whole day! And it blends so well with face oils and serums. I like to mix it with the purple nighttime serum from beekman and it leaves my skin so healthy and smooth. My only issue so far has been that the quality is not always consistent. I've had bottles that are good to the last drop, but I had one where the product started to separate about half way through and essentially became unusable. Another came to me already separated and I had to return it. It's annoying but the pros still outweigh that con for me.

reviews.headline: My face looks sunburnt and my skin is raised
reviews.comments: Do not reccomend for sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Very Drying
reviews.comments: My face felt tight and dry every time i used this in the morning. Not great for dry skin.

reviews.headline: Major issues with the pump on the 100ml size
reviews.comments: This is a lightweight cream that I think I would have been able to enjoy much more and more fully evaluate if the pump ever worked properly. It took about 10 pumps to get barely enough product for my face and neck, and I wasn't loading up. I didn't want to return the product and doom it to the dumpster because I think it's a pretty good cream, but after giving up, I put it in a Pyrex bowl and used it as body cream to finish it. I love the idea of a large, refillable size, but the pump is a major detractor.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Water comes out when you press to get moisturizer. Everything separates and it's not moisturizing. This product should not be on the market.

reviews.headline: Just ok
reviews.comments: For the price, I was expecting to love this moisturizer. Its nothing special though, and I find that my cheaper moisturizer does a better job. Probably wont repurchase.

reviews.headline: Ehhh not worth it
reviews.comments: Was looking forward to using this, however it does not keep skin hydrated. The product feels rubbery and not smooth at all. If you are looking for silky skin this is not your product.

reviews.headline: Ehhh not worth it
reviews.comments: Was looking forward to using this, however it does not keep skin hydrated. The product feels rubbery and not smooth at all. If you are looking for silky skin this is not your product.

media.headline: Great moisturizer and super cute too!
media.caption: How unique is the packaging!

faceoff_positive.comments: Gentle enough to use every day, doesnt leave me greasy, and it's one more product that makes me LOVE this brand. I finally found one that helps with my rosacea. I now know what my face without redness looks like thanks to them. This cream is my holy grail now.
faceoff_positive.headline: Going to buy again

faceoff_negative.comments: Been investigating the ingredients in my skin care routine because I have been going through horrible cystic acne breakout. Turns out this is yet another beekman product that contains highly comedogenic ingredients. SMH. Really disappointed, was totally sold on this brand and convinced it was safe for acne prone skin via their blooming skin show and other various promotional outlets. Really disappointed. Will be switching to another brand, feel lied to and they have lost my trust.
faceoff_negative.headline: Excellent body cream!
